mapper.insert: INSERT INTO F_ACCOUNT_TBL(fNum,fAcNumber ,id, fBalance ,fNewDate , fAcPwd) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(fNum)+1, 1) FROM F_ACCOUNT_TBL),#{fAcNumber},#{id},#{fBalance},sysdate,#{fAcPwd})

INSERT INTO TRANSFER_TBL(tNum, acNumber, tDepositnum, tDepositBank, tType, tAmount, myMemo, yourMemo, tDate) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(tNum) + 1, 1) FROM TRANSFER_TBL), #{acNumber}, #{tDepositnum}, '돼지은행', '출금', #{tAmount}, '펀드계좌개설', '펀드계좌개설', sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT fNum, fAcNumber ,fBalance ,fNewDate ,fLastDate , fAcPwd ,fTrsfLimit FROM f_account_tbl WHERE id = #{id} ORDER BY fNewDate DESC

SELECT h.FHAVINGNUM ,h.FNOWPRICE ,h.FNOWPROFIT ,h.FPROFIT ,h.FNOWTOTAL ,h.FHAVINGCNT ,h.FPRINCIPAL ,d.FPDNAME ,d.FBUYPRICE FROM F_ACCOUNT_TBL a , F_DETAIL_TBL d , F_HAVING_TBL h WHERE a.FNUM = d.FNUM AND d.FTRANSNUM = h.FTRANSNUM AND d.FDETAILSTATE = '매수' AND a.ID = #{id}
